title: (Tánaiste, Minister for Foreign Affairs and Minister for Defence) Order 2023.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Tánaiste, Minister for Foreign Affairs and Minister for Defence) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (tanaiste minister foreign affair minister defence) order 2023

title: (Tánaiste, Minister for Foreign Affairs and Minister for Defence) Order 2023.
heading: 2. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose
text_raw:
2. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose 
address have been deposited at the offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, 
is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Tánaiste and Minister for Foreign 
Affairs with effect from 17 December 2022.
text_norm: 2 person mentioned schedule particular whose address deposited office department taoiseach appointed special adviser tanaiste minister foreign affair effect 17 december 2022

title: (Tánaiste, Minister for Foreign Affairs and Minister for Defence) Order 2023.
heading: 3. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose
text_raw:
3. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose 
address have been deposited at the offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, 
is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Tánaiste and Minister for Defence 
with effect from 17 December 2022.
text_norm: 3 person mentioned schedule particular whose address deposited office department taoiseach appointed special adviser tanaiste minister defence effect 17 december 2022

title: (Tánaiste, Minister for Foreign Affairs and Minister for Defence) Order 2023.
heading: 4. Gráinne Weld, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
4. Gráinne Weld, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Foreign Affairs, is appointed to be a Special 
Adviser to the Tánaiste and Minister for Foreign Affairs with effect from 17 
December 2022.
text_norm: 4 grainne weld particular whose address deposited office department foreign affair appointed special adviser tanaiste minister foreign affair effect 17 december 2022

title: (Tánaiste, Minister for Foreign Affairs and Minister for Defence) Order 2023.
heading: 5. Gráinne Weld, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
5. Gráinne Weld, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Foreign Affairs, is appointed to be a Special 
Adviser to the Tánaiste and Minister for Defence with effect from 17 
December 2022. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 24th March, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [167] 3
text_norm: 5 grainne weld particular whose address deposited office department foreign affair appointed special adviser tanaiste minister defence effect 17 december 2022 notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 24th march 2023 167 3

title: (Tánaiste, Minister for Foreign Affairs and Minister for Defence) Order 2023.
heading: Alan Ahearne
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Alan Ahearne 

Deirdre Gillane 

Diarmuid Lynch 

Pat McParland 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

21 March, 2023. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Tánaiste.
